name: autopaper-skills
description: AI-powered content tools from AutoPaper - extract article metadata, generate info cards, and automate content curation workflows

plugins.name: extract-metadata
plugins.description: Extract structured metadata from article URLs or content using Claude AI - titles, authors, summaries, tags, and key points

plugins.name: generate-card
